etymologies: Japanese, from teri ‘gloss, luster’ + yaki ‘to fry, grill, sear’

definitions: a Japanese dish consisting of fish or meat marinated in soy sauce and grilled.
shortDefinitions: Japanese dish consisting of fish or meat marinated in soy sauce and grilled

definitions: a mixture of soy sauce, sake, ginger, and other flavorings, used in Japanese cooking as a marinade or glaze.
shortDefinitions: mixture of soy flavourings, used in Japanese cooking as marinade
